name: Cheesy Crackers
author: Annie
summary: Cheesy crackers just like your favorite! Easy, fast, fun, and yummy!
ingredients: 1 teaspoon Creole seasoning (such as Tony Chachere's®)
directions: Preheat the oven to 300 degrees F (150 degrees C)
Combine milk, cornstarch, and seasoning in a saucepan over medium heat
Whisk constantly and bring to a simmer
Simmer for about 1 minute, then remove from the heat
Add Cheddar cheese and mix until smooth
Sift flour into the mixture a bit at a time and mix until you have a dough ball you can roll out
Roll out the dough on a sheet of parchment paper until as thin as you can
Cut dough into strips with a pizza cutter, and then into squares
Slide crackers and parchment paper onto a cookie sheet
Bake in the preheated oven until crispy, 20 to 30 minutes
Remove from the oven and allow to cool before serving
